import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Input, Ripple, initMDB } from "mdb-ui-kit"; import {useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; initMDB({ Input, Ripple }); function AddBooks({addbooks}) { const navigate = useNavigate(); const[author,setAuthor]=useState("") const[title,setTitle]=useState("") const[description,setDescription]=useState("") const[category,setCategory]=useState("") const[trending,setTrending]=useState() const[coverImage,setCoverImage]=useState("") const[Price,setPrice]=useState("") const[createdAt,setCreatedAt]=useState("") return (
setAuthor(e.target.value)} />
setTitle(e.target.value)} />
setDescription(e.target.value)} />
setCategory(e.target.value)} />
setTrending(e.target.value)} />
setCoverImage(e.target.value)} />
setPrice(e.target.value)} />
setCreatedAt(e.target.value)} />
) } export default AddBooks
